sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm a passionate 3rd year Computer Science student with a strong interest in web development and software engineering. I enjoy learning new technologies and applying theoretical knowledge to build practical solutions.

Through my studies and personal projects, I've developed skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and I'm currently exploring modern frameworks like React. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and expand my technical expertise.

Education

3rd Year CS Student

Focus

Web Development

Status

Learning & Growing

Goal

Software Developer

{/* Decorative elements */}
); }; export default About;
